name: MLObjectDetector.ModelParameters.ValidationData
desc: A validation dataset for an object detector.

items.name: case split(strategy: MLSplitStrategy)
items.desc: A validation dataset Create ML derives by randomly selecting a portion of the object detectorâ€™s training dataset using the split strategy.

items.name: case dataSource(MLObjectDetector.DataSource)
items.desc: A validation dataset you provide as a data source.

items.name: case table(MLDataTable, imageColumn: String, annotationColumn: String)
items.desc: A validation dataset you provide as a data table.

items.name: case none
items.desc: An empty validation dataset that skips the model validation phase after training.
